column15: Watching with ten-thousand eyes, listening with a million ears...
When they are given the Social Security number of a teenager who was killed two years ago, Reese and Finch begin to question the infallibility of The Machine.
The latest number is an ex-soldier who's now part of a gang that specialize in robberies.
Reese and Finch surveil their latest POI, Dr. Megan Tillman, while she's on call and after hours to unravel the threat surrounding the promising young physician.
The Machine produces the social security number of a judge renowned for his tough sentencing
Mr. Reese goes as the new driver of fixer Zoe Morgan in order to decide if she's a victim or perpetrator.
The Machine identifies a school teacher who witnessed a mob hit as their next number
Reese and Finch discover that their latest POI has connections to Cold War Soviet espionage circles
Reese and Finch's game of cat and mouse with Detective Carter becomes infinitely more complicated when The Machine declares that she is their newest POI.
As Detective Carter deals with the fallout from her recent encounter with Reese and Finch, The Machine ups the ante for the duo by giving them four Social Security numbers instead of one.
Reese works the computer while Finch does the legwork with their latest POI, a building super who keeps too close an eye on his tenants.
When Carter finally comes face-to-face with Reese, he urges her to join forces to help with their latest number, a scrappy young lawyer
Finch and Reese run surveillance on a man who's been unemployed for eight months without his family knowing.

column11: Learns of Finch from Will Ingram
column15: The Machine identifies Darren, a teenager whose brother was just murdered, as the next POI.
Reese discovers there's more to the story after he infiltrates a smuggling ring to get close to his latest POI.

column6: Uses Scarface to kill SEC agent
column15: A trader at a major investment bank becomes embroiled in a multi-million dollar financial scam.

column3: Tells Elias where his father is
column15: Carter and Reese team up to protect Moretti from Elias. Meanwhile, Finch's new number is an eight-month-old baby girl.
Finch and Reese investigate a person who seems to be leading a double life.
Elias is finally ready to eliminate the dons and become the leader of the underground.

column5: Kills HR goon to save Reese
column15: Reese goes undercover as a security guard to prevent a robbery.
Finch gives Reese the day off for his birthday and works the new number with Fusco. Meanwhile, the FBI start looking into the disappearance of Jessica's husband.
Finch and Reese tail an NSA spy who discovers the Machine's existence

column4: Learns of Fusco's partnership with Reese
column5: Learns of Carter's partnership with Reese
column15: Reese and the latest number are hunted by HR and the FBI. Meanwhile, Corwin closes in.
